crosswords

I've made a few crosswords around the place, sometimes in service of puzzle hunts, sometimes not. Here you can find crosswords I didn't make for some larger event or hunt.

The crossword with rotational symmetry is a crossword with a fun gimick I made a few years back.

I also made a bunch of cryptic crosswords in highschool that I think stand up pretty well.
